city. He said the event occurred around 5 p.m. with children in attendance. Don't count Mayor Tom Leppert among the "great majority" of people clamoring to give Michael Vick the civic honor usually reserved for meritorious citizenship: "The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval." As it happens, one of the people attending this ceremony was not a wayward child but the caretaker of one of Michael Vick 's dogs rescued from his kennels. Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said in the press release: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. What: Barbara Walters , who had her own surgery to repair a faulty heart valve last year, addresses heart disease and the fear many have of a heart operation in A Matter of Life and Death. She talks to former Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Robin Williams and Regis Philbin , celebrities who've had heart surgeries. She also talks to doctors, including her own, about prevention and the warning signs of heart trouble.
